mapper.insert: insert into class_qna values(null,#{ml_num},#{class_num},#{qna_content},(select ifnull(max(qna_ref)+1,1) from class_qna q),#{qna_lev},now(),0)
mapper.select: select q.qna_num,q.qna_ref,q.qna_lev,q.qna_content,q.qna_regdate, m.mb_name,p.pro_num from class_qna q join member_info m on q.ml_num = m.ml_num join profile_img p on m.pro_num = p.pro_num where class_num=#{class_num} and qna_lev=0 and qna_status=0 order by qna_ref desc,qna_num asc limit #{startRow},4

select q.qna_num,q.qna_ref,q.qna_lev,q.qna_content,q.qna_regdate, ci.tutor_nickname,ci.pro_num from class_qna q,class_info ci where ci.class_num=#{class_num} and qna_lev=1 and qna_ref=#{qna_ref} and qna_status=0 order by qna_ref desc,qna_num asc;
select ifnull(count(*),0) from class_qna where class_num=#{class_num} and qna_lev=0 and qna_status=0
